channel.title: Resources on TravelgateX Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Resources on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Realeases Notes
item.description: Check out this list of new releases and changes applied on the TravelgateX GraphQL API. 2018-04-17 ⚠️ Field MemberData.roles changed type from String to RoleConnection ✅ Field mappea was added to object type Mutation ✅ Field operations was added to object type APIData ✅ Field children was added to object type GroupData ✅ Argument codes: [ID!] added to field MemberData.roles ✅ Argument after: String added to field MemberData.roles ✅ Argument before: String added to field MemberData.
